MCQ: Which of the following is a unifying theme in biology?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Evolution | c: Regulation of internal environments | d: All of the above

MCQ: What is the study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Physics | c: Biology | d: Geology

MCQ: What is the primary unit of life?
Choices: a: Atoms | b: Molecules | c: Cells | d: Tissues

MCQ: Which of the following is NOT a subdiscipline within biology?
Choices: a: Molecular biology | b: Chemistry | c: Anatomy and physiology | d: Evolutionary biology

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1 billion years ago | b: 2.5 billion years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 5 billion years ago
